returns._0: True if the user can interact
True if the address is blacklisted

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns._0: True if the interaction is allowed

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

blacklistAddress(address).notice: Add an address to the blacklist

canInteract(address).notice: Check if a user can interact

isBlacklisted(address).notice: Check if an address is blacklisted

minInteractionInterval().notice: Minimum interval between interactions in seconds

recordInteraction(address).notice: Record interaction and check rate limits

whitelistAddress(address).notice: Remove an address from the blacklist
